overview: Metallica perform live at the Olympic Main Stadium in Seoul, Korea in 2006, as part of their ESCAPE FROM THE STUDIO tour. Setlist: Creeping Death / Fuel / Wherever I May Roam / Harvester of Sorrow / Welcome Home (Sanitarium) / Frantic / The Unforgiven / For Whom the Bell Tolls / Orion (preceded by Pink Floyd's "Oneâ€¦ more ) / Master of Puppets / Fade to Black / Battery / Sad but True / Nothing Else Matters / One / Enter Sandman / The Other New Song / Seek & Destroy
title: Metallica: Live in Seoul 2006
